import React, { useState } from 'react' import * as busApi from '../api/bus-search' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import SeatLayout from './SeatLayout' import SeatReservation from './SeatReservation' const SearchBus = () => { const [searchResult, setSearchReasult] = useState([]) const [travelPlan, setTravelPlan] = useState({}) const [tab, setTab] = useState(1) const [busNum, setBusNumber] = useState({}) const [changeFab,setChangeTab] = useState(changeTab()) const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() busApi.busSearch(travelPlan) .then(response => response.data) .then(data => { setSearchReasult(data.result) }) } const changeTab = (tab) => { if (tab === 3) { setTab(3) } console.log(tab) return } const viwSeats = (e, busNumber, tab) => { e.preventDefault() setTab(tab) setBusNumber(busNumber) renderTabPanel(tab) } const renderTabPanel = (tab) => { switch (tab) { case 1: return (
handleSubmitEvent(e)}>
handleChangeEvent(e, 'from')} className="form-control " placeholder="From" />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'to')} className="form-control" placeholder="To" />
handleChangeEvent(e, 'trvDate')} className="form-control" placeholder="Travel Date" />
{renderItems(searchResult)}
) case 2: return (
) case 3: return (
hheelllooo
) case 4: return (

) } } const renderItems = (searchResult) => { return searchResult.map((result => { return (
Bus Type Departure Arrival Travel Date Total Seats Fare View Seats
{result.busType} {result.service.dep} {result.service.arr} {result.service.trvDate} {result.totalSeats} {result.service.fare}
) })) } const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { const fieldValue = e.target.value setTravelPlan({ ...travelPlan, [field]: fieldValue }) console.log(travelPlan) } return (

) } export default SearchBus;
